definition: not deterred by danger or pain; brave
sentence: The firefighters were courageous as they entered the burning building.

definition: very strange or unusual, especially so as to cause interest or amusement
sentence: His bizarre sense of humor made everyone laugh.

definition: able to withstand or recover quickly from difficult conditions
sentence: The resilient community rebuilt itself after the devastating storm.

definition: having or showing keen mental discernment and good judgment
sentence: Her sagacious advice helped me navigate a difficult decision.

definition: having a ready insight into and understanding of things
sentence: His perspicacious observations during the meeting impressed everyone.
The susurrus of the leaves created a calming atmosphere in the forest.
The pulchritudinous landscape of the mountains left the hikers in awe.

definition: The most perfect or typical example of a quality or class.
sentence: She was the quintessence of elegance and grace at the gala.

definition: Occurring or discovered by chance in a happy or beneficial way.
sentence: Their serendipitous meeting at the caf√© led to a lifelong friendship.

definition: Going beyond ordinary limits; surpassing; exceeding.
sentence: The transcendental experience of standing atop the mountain was unforgettable.
